name: Spaceship Waltz
description:
A short first person boss-fight set in space.
Use your jetpack and your laser pistol to defeat the spaceship. Watch your oxygen level. If you're running low on oxygen, fly to planets to refill your oxygen tank.

Controls:

Left mouse button : Shoot laser
Right mouse button : Jetpack boost
WASD : Movement
Spacebar : Ascend
Shift : Descend
